title: E-commerce API Documentation
shortDesc: API docs for a sample e-commerce platform.
description: Detailed documentation covering endpoints for authentication, product management, and checkout workflow for a scalable e-commerce system.

title: Course Booking API Documentation
shortDesc: Docs for a course booking API.
description: Comprehensive documentation for endpoints handling course creation, enrollment, and scheduling, ensuring clarity for developers integrating the system.

title: Course Booking App
shortDesc: Web app for booking online courses.
description: An intuitive booking system where users can browse, enroll, and manage online courses. Built with a responsive UI and secure backend APIs.

title: E-commerce App
description: A demo e-commerce application with product listings, shopping cart, and secure checkout flow. Designed to showcase frontend and backend integration.

title: Airline Booking System Mockup
description: A static design mockup visualizing the flow of searching flights, selecting seats, and booking tickets. Focused on clean UI and user experience.

title: Airline Booking System Prototype
shortDesc: Prototype of a flight booking app.
description: A functional prototype showcasing user journey for searching flights, selecting seats, and completing bookings, with mock data and design system.
